response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at $15,000 to us due to its unique features and unparalleled benefits. We believe it could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Considering its intrinsic value and potential impact, we kindly invite you to consider acquiring this product at our special offer price of $15,000. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 15000}
